#include "spark.h"

Include dependency graph for euler_formula.cc:

Detailed Description

Euler explicit integration formula.

1st-order scheme a.k.a. Backward Euler scheme a.k.a. Open Euler scheme

Usage:

  • used inside the macro class euler.cm.
  • NOT suited for stiff problems
  • NOT suited for high accuracy requirement

Initialization:

  • dynamic variable x must get an initial value
  • derivative xdot is initialized through the initial time solution.
